casebody.data:
ASSOCIATED INDUSTRIAL
v.
FLEMING ENG. No. 107A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2004. C.J. Childers, for Fleming Engineering, Inc. R. Bruce Thompson, II, Raleigh, for Associated Industrial Contractor.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of April 2004 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Fleming Engineering, Inc.) shall have up to and including the 7th day of May 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2004."
